tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_agreements; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_agreements AS SELECT ag.id AS amp_agreement_id,
ag.close_date AS close_date, to_char(ag.close_date, 'J')::integer AS close_date_code,
ag.effective_date AS effective_date, to_char(ag.effective_date, 'J')::integer AS effective_date_code,
ag.signature_date AS signature_date, to_char(ag.signature_date, 'J')::integer AS signature_date_code,
ag.parlimentary_date AS parliamentary_date, to_char(ag.parlimentary_date, 'J')::integer AS parliamentary_date_code,
ag.code AS agreement_code, ag.title AS agreement_title, (ag.title::text || ' - '::text) || ag.code::text AS agreement_title_code
FROM amp_agreement ag UNION ALL SELECT 999999999,
NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Undefined', 'Undefined', 'Undefined'
ORDER BY amp_agreement_id;
